Description: - Outer ziplines hero speed increased by 20% relative to inner lanes (same as troopers on outer lanes zipline being faster)
- Urn now drops when teleporting with {{Icon|Mirage}} Mirage's {{Icon|Traveler}} Traveler
- Fixed {{Icon|Wraith}} Wraith Cards, {{Icon|Shiv}} Shiv Rage and lifesteal from increasing by shooting the shop
